tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_inquiries (
  inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  inquiry_text TEXT,
  inquiry_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE responses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inquiry_id INT,
  responder_id INT,
  response_text TEXT,
  response_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    inquiry_id INT,
    response_id INT,
    analysis_text TEXT,
    analysis_date DATE
);
